scripts.say: After making our rounds, we managed to purchase everything we came out for.
We still have some free time before we're supposed to meet up with Sheffield.
Commander, why don't we rest for a bit?
In accordance to Newcastle's suggestion, we sat down on a bench at the street corner.

options.content: Strike up a conversation with Newcastle

scripts.say: I rarely get to shop with anyone but the Royal Maids.
Ever since I accepted Her Majesty's appointment, I've pretty much done everything with the other maids. Even afterwards, when I returned to the Royal Islands, I was always with Glasgow...
I'm sorry, I hope it doesn't sound like I'm brooding...
Don't worry about me. I'll be able to adapt, no matter where I am.
She pulled a book out of hammerspace and placed it upon her thighs.
Whether in times of war or times of peace, whether I'm serving as a maid or as a secretary, I can be myself as long as I'm surrounded by those dear to me.
This is what "peace" means to me. As for my dreams, those are but trivial matters.
Her Majesty might disapprove of my viewpoint, but...
She did once tell me, verbatim, "You should hold onto your dreams".
